abstract: Family members and neighbors of Jabeur Khachnaoui and Yassine Abidi, gunmen responsible for terrorist attack on National Bardo Museum in Tunis that killed more than 20 people, are both shocked and shamed by assault.
lead_paragraph: Interviews with relatives and neighbors of the gunmen who killed 22 people in a rampage at the National Bardo Museum in Tunis last month betrayed equal measures of shock and shame.

headline.main: In Tunisia, One Brother Studied Philosophy, Another Gunned Down Tourists
headline.print_headline: In Tunisia, One Brother Studied Philosophy, Another Gunned Down Tourists

snippet: Interviews with relatives and neighbors of the gunmen who killed 22 people in a rampage at the National Bardo Museum in Tunis last month betrayed equal measures of shock and shame.
